revisions.rev:
{{Wiktionarypar|envy}}
'''[[Envy]]''' is an emotion, which is also one of the seven deadly sins.
'''Envy''' may also refer to:
==Places== *[[Envy, Switzerland]], a village in Switzerland
==Films and television== *[[Envy (2004 film)|''Envy'' (2004 film)]], a 2004 comedy film *[[Envy (2009 film)|''Envy'' (2009 film)]], a 2009 Turkish film
==Music== *[[Envy (band)]], a Japanese hardcore band *[[Envy (rapper)]], British female MC / Rapper *[[Envy (Eve's Plum album)|''Envy'' (Eve's Plum album)]], a 1993 album by Eve's Plum *[[Envy (Ambitious Lovers album)|''Envy'' (Ambitious Lovers album)]]
==Literature and publications== *[[Envy (novel)|''Envy'' (novel)]], a 1927 novel by the Soviet author Yuri Olesha *[[List of Fullmetal Alchemist characters#Envy|Envy]], a character in the [[Fullmetal Alchemist|Fullmetal Alchemist anime]] and manga
==Others==
*[[ENVY Post Production]], a British, broadcast post production company *[[VIA Envy]], a sound chip *Envy, a working title for ''[[Unreal Tournament 3]]'' *Envy, a polish pornstar *Envy/Developer, a version control extension for [[Smalltalk]] systems *[[Envy (software)]], a Python script for Linux that can install drivers for ATI and Nvidia cards *[[HP Envy]], laptops manufactured and sold by Hewlett-Packard
==See also== *[[Penis envy]] *[[Womb and vagina envy]]
